name: Moustache Madness
body:
### Moustache Madness
Ever wanted to add moustaches to pictures of all your friends on the go? Now you can! Just drag and drop moustaches onto pictures on your phone, and save them or share them with your friends, either via text, email, or on facebook!
tagline: Drag and drop moustaches on photos of your friends (Android 1.6+)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
